trecho:
'Cause it's too cold 
For you here and now 
So let me hold 
Both your hands in the holes of my sweater

I keep on switchin', I know 
I need a different approach 
It's all because I wanna 
Show you that I'm so capable

Hard not to fall for you 
I gave you all my heart... 
You're running through my veins, something 
I can't change

If I don't have you with me, I'm alone 
You know I never know which way to go 
I think I need you with me for all time 
When I need new direction for my mind

When I feel like I'm strangled 
You treat me like an angel 
Show me all different angles 
And I never, ever felt that way, uh

Kiss me hard before you go 
Summertime sadness 
I just wanted you to know 
That, baby, you're the best

No one even knows how hard life was 
I don't even think about it now because 
I finally found you 
(Oh, sing it to me)

But to me, girl, you're so much more than gorgeous 
So much more than perfect 
Right now, I know that I'm not really worth it 
If you give me time, I can work on it

I've found a reason for me 
To change who I used to be 
A reason to start over new 
And the reason is you

I get those goosebumps every time, yeah 
You come around, yeah 
You ease my mind, you make everything feel fine

I don't care how long it takes 
As long as I'm with you, 
I've got a smile on my face 
Save your tears, it'll be okay

My single line of stars in noon 
Reflection of the very Moon, I do... 
Show my love for you 
Can I show my love for you?
